<Extension()> Public Function ListMetrics (operations As ICollectionPartitionRegionOperations, resourceGroupName As String, accountName As String, region As String, databaseRid As String, collectionRid As String, filter As String) As IEnumerable(Of PartitionMetric)

static member ListMetrics : Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.ICollectionPartitionRegionOperations * string * string * string * string * string * string -> seq<Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.Models.PartitionMetric>
MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.CollectionPartitionRegionOperationsExtensions.ListMetrics (operations, resourceGroupName, accountName, region, databaseRid, collectionRid, filter)

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.
Cosmos DB region, with spaces between words and each word capitalized.

An OData filter expression that describes a subset of metrics to return. The parameters that can be filtered are name.value (name of the metric, can have an or of multiple names), startTime, endTime, and timeGrain. The supported operator is eq.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the metrics determined by the given filter for the given collection and region, split by partition.
